update t_members
MEMBER_LV_ID = #{memberLvId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NICK_NAME = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRST_NAME = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_NAME = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
B_YEAR = #{bYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LANG = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADVANCE = #{advance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADVANCE_FREEZE = #{advanceFreeze,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPERIENCE = #{experience,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POINT_SUMMATION = #{pointSummation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POINT_USEABLE = #{pointUseable,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POINT_USED = #{pointUsed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POINT_DISRATE = #{pointDisrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETTLED_TIME = #{settledTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIZ_MONEY = #{bizMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REFER_ID = #{referId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFER_URL = #{referUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFO_INTEGRITY = #{infoIntegrity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INTEREST = #{interest,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
FAV_TAGS = #{favTags,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
ADDON = #{addon,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from t_members where 1=1 and EMAIL = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ORDER_NUM desc

select

select email from t_members where MEMBER_ID in ( select MEMBER_ID from t_business_storemember where store_id in ( select store_id from t_goods where DISABLED="0" and MARKETABLE_ALLOW='0' and P_1 is not NULL and store < P_1 GROUP BY COMPANY_ID , STORE_ID))
